languages.text: {n}Ваш рот непроизвольно наполняется слюной — каждое слово Теодоры звучит музыкой для ваших ушей. {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Сущность{/d}, затаившаяся в недрах разума, просит, молит, требует, чтобы вы дали ответ немедленно — и ответом этим может быть лишь согласие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ваш рот непроизвольно наполняется слюной — каждое слово Теодоры звучит музыкой для ваших ушей. Сущность, затаившаяся в недрах разума, просит, молит, требует, чтобы вы дали ответ немедленно — и ответом этим может быть лишь согласие.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entity{/d} that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Ваш рот непроизвольно наполняется слюной — каждое слово Теодоры звучит музыкой для ваших ушей. {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Сущность{/d}, затаившаяся в недрах разума, просит, молит, требует, чтобы вы дали ответ немедленно — и ответом этим может быть лишь согласие.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The entity that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

{n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The entity that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

{n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The entity that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你的嘴里不禁流出了口水。西奥多拉所说的每一个字，听起来都像音乐一样悦耳。此刻，潜藏在你内心最深处的{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}存在{/d}正在恳请你、请求你、命令你立刻告诉她答案。而毫无疑问，这个答案只能是“我接受”。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entity{/d} that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的嘴里不禁流出了口水。西奥多拉所说的每一个字，听起来都像音乐一样悦耳。此刻，潜藏在你内心最深处的存在正在恳请你、请求你、命令你立刻告诉她答案。而毫无疑问，这个答案只能是“我接受”。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Se te hace la boca agua. Cada palabra que pronuncia Theodora es música para tus oídos. El {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}ser{/d} que ahora habita en lo más profundo de tu mente te implora y suplica que respondas de inmediato y que la única respuesta válida es aceptar.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entity{/d} that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Se te hace la boca agua. Cada palabra que pronuncia Theodora es música para tus oídos. El ser que ahora habita en lo más profundo de tu mente te implora y suplica que respondas de inmediato y que la única respuesta válida es aceptar.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたの口からは唾液が分泌され始める。シオドーラが話す言葉のひとつひとつがあなたの耳には音楽のように聞こえる。今あなたの心の最も深いところに住んでいる{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}存在{/d}は、あなたにすぐに答えてほしいと懇願し、要求している。そしてその答えは「受け入れる」以外はありえない。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entity{/d} that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたの口からは唾液が分泌され始める。テオドラが話す言葉のひとつひとつがあなたの耳には音楽のように聞こえる。今あなたの心の最も深いところに住んでいる存在は、あなたにすぐに答えてほしいと懇願し、要求しています。そしてその答えは受け入れる以外の何もありません。{/n}
{n}あなたの口からは唾液が分泌され始める。シオドーラが話す言葉のひとつひとつがあなたの耳には音楽のように聞こえる。今あなたの心の最も深いところに住んでいる{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}存在{/d}は、あなたにすぐに答えてほしいと懇願し、要求している。そしてその答えは「受け入れる」以外はありえない。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les mots de Théodora résonnent comme de la musique à vos oreilles et vous font saliver. L'{d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entité{/d} qui s'est désormais installée dans les recoins les plus profonds de votre esprit vous implore, vous supplie, exige que vous lui donniez une réponse immédiate... et cette réponse ne peut être que le consentement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entity{/d} that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mots de Théodora résonnent comme de la musique à vos oreilles et vous font saliver. L'entité qui s'est désormais installée dans les recoins les plus profonds de votre esprit vous implore, vous supplie, exige que vous lui donniez une réponse immédiate... et cette réponse ne peut être que le consentement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}In deinem Mund bildet sich Spucke – jedes Wort von Theodora ist Musik in deinen Ohren. Die {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}Wesenheit{/d}, die nun in den hintersten Schlupfwinkeln deines Geists wohnt, fleht, bettelt und verlangt, dass du ihr sofort eine Antwort gibst – und worin außer Zustimmung sollte diese bestehen?{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entity{/d} that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}In deinem Mund bildet sich Spucke – jedes Wort von Theodora ist Musik in deinen Ohren. Die Wesenheit, die nun in den hintersten Schlupfwinkeln deines Geists wohnt, fleht, bettelt und verlangt, dass du ihr sofort eine Antwort gibst – und worin außer Zustimmung sollte diese bestehen?{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ağzın sulanmaya başlıyor. Theodora'nın ağzından çıkan her kelime kulağına müzik gibi geliyor. Zihninin en derin oyuklarında ikamet eden {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}varlık{/d} yalvarıyor, yakarıyor. Theodora'ya derhâl cevap vermeni talep ediyor ki bu cevap da kabulden, teslimiyetten gayrısı olamaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Your mouth begins to salivate — each word Theodora speaks is like music to your ears. The {d|Encyclopedia:Prologue_CutByKnife}entity{/d} that now dwells in the deepest recesses of your mind is pleading, begging, demanding that you give her an immediate answer — and that answer can be nothing other than acceptance.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ağzın sulanmaya başlıyor. Theodora'nın ağzından çıkan her kelime kulağına müzik gibi geliyor. Zihninin en derin oyuklarında ikamet eden varlık yalvarıyor, yakarıyor. Theodora'ya derhâl cevap vermeni talep ediyor ki bu cevap da kabulden, teslimiyetten gayrısı olamaz.{/n}
